coreAttributes.name: tiny bikini top
coreAttributes.description: This bra is so skimpy it borders on visual molestation. Its "cups" are, in fact, not cups, but rather miniscule flat triangles, that barely cover the wearer's nipples. If the wearer's nipples aren't above average in size, that is.
